form.LN:
Besedo
who
uporabljamo kot osebek ali predmet.

sense.def:
Izraz
who
uporabimo, kadar vprašamo po imenu ali identiteti neke osebe.

seg.quote: Who are you going to invite?

sense.def:
Izraz
who
uporabimo tudi v odvisnih vprašalnih in trdilnih stavkih o imenu ali identiteti neke osebe.

seg.quote: She didn't know who I was.

sense.def:
Izraz
who
uporabimo tudi na začetku odvisnega stavka, ki določi osebo, o kateri govorimo.

seg.quote: If you can't do it, we'll find someone who can.
Joe, who was always early, was there already.
